entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.9.0 - AI powered Correspondent detection
entry.content:
paperless-gpt v0.9.0

We’re excited to announce paperless-gpt v0.9.0, introducing Automatic Correspondent Management on top of our existing LLM-powered OCR, AI-driven tagging, and document title suggestions. While OCR remains unchanged since our last release, the new Correspondent Management feature is here to simplify your workflow even further.

New in v0.9

1. Correspondent Management

  • Auto-Identify Senders: paperless-gpt now analyzes document data (including OCR text, if enabled) to auto-generate correspondents.
  • Manual Overrides: If the AI guess is off or you prefer custom naming, you can easily edit or override the suggested correspondent.
  • Improved Tagging Synergy: Combine auto-generated correspondents with your manual, automatic, or LLM-based tags for a more holistic organization.

2. Updated Environment Variables

  • AUTO_GENERATE_CORRESPONDENTS: Set to true to opt into the new auto-discovery of senders.
  • CORRESPONDENT_BLACK_LIST: Provide a comma-separated list of names you want to exclude from auto-detection (e.g. John Doe,Unwanted Bot).

Note: The OCR features remain exactly the same as in previous releases. No changes were made to the LLM-based OCR pipeline, page limits, or environment variables relating to OCR in this update.

Why It Matters

  1. Less Data Entry: No need to type in the same sender’s name repeatedly—let the AI do that for you.
  2. Enhanced Organization: Search by sender/correspondent in paperless-ngx to quickly locate relevant documents.
  3. Flexible Workflows: Keep your existing OCR and tagging setup intact, while seamlessly layering on correspondent management—manual or automatic.

OCR Still Rock-Solid

While v0.9 introduces no changes to the OCR functionality, you can continue to leverage: - LLM-based OCR from previous versions for context-aware text extraction. - Manual or Automatic tag flows, powered by environment variables like MANUAL_TAG, AUTO_TAG, and AUTO_OCR_TAG.

Upgrade Steps

  1. Pull the Latest Docker Image
    bash docker pull icereed/paperless-gpt:latest
  2. Set Up New Variables (Optional):
    bash AUTO_GENERATE_CORRESPONDENTS=true # is true by default CORRESPONDENT_BLACK_LIST="John Doe,Unwanted Bot"
  3. Restart your container.
  4. docker-compose up -d or docker run -d ...

Example Flow

```mermaid sequenceDiagram participant PaperlessGPT as paperless-gpt participant LLM as Language Model participant PaperlessNGX as paperless-ngx

PaperlessGPT->>PaperlessNGX: Retrieve Document
PaperlessNGX-->>PaperlessGPT: Return Document Data
PaperlessGPT->>LLM: (If OCR is enabled) Perform LLM-based OCR
LLM-->>PaperlessGPT: Return Extracted Text
PaperlessGPT->>LLM: Perform LLM-based Metadata Extraction
LLM-->>PaperlessGPT: Return Extracted Metadata
PaperlessGPT->>PaperlessNGX: Update Document with Correspondent, Title, Tags

```

Poetic Nod to the Future

"An AI that not only sees—but knows who writes,
Correspondent auto-chosen, no more manual fights,
OCR stays sturdy, forging text from scans in lights,
Version 0.9 sets the stage for still bigger heights!"

Enjoy the Correspondent Magic

With v0.9, you’ll see new power in how you manage your docs—no changes to OCR, just brand-new ways to keep track of who sent each document. Let us know what you think; your feedback helps guide what’s next!

Happy Correspondent-Organizing & Document Managing!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.8.4...v0.9.0

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Hello Discord! ...and dependency upgrades
entry.content:
Welcome to our Discord server!

The biggest news is that we got a cool Discord server including a help desk. Kudos to martinjuhasz for setting this up. Join us here: https://discord.gg/fJQppDH2J7

Actual code changes in this release

  • fix(deps): update dependency axios to v1.7.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/80
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v5.4.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/77
  • feat: remove paperless-gpt related tags from available tags by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/123
  • fix(deps): update module gorm.io/driver/sqlite to v1.5.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/81
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-icons to v5.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/124
  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript to v5.7.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/122
  • fix(deps): update dependency @headlessui/react to v2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/91
  • chore(deps): update dependency postcss to v8.5.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/129
  • chore(deps): update actions/setup-node action to v4 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/74
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-router-dom to v6.28.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/130
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/node to v22.10.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/125
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-tag-autocomplete to v7.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/131
  • chore(deps): update dependency eslint-plugin-react-refresh to v0.4.18 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/115

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.9.0...v0.9.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Prompt templating enhancements
entry.content:
Prompt templating enhancements

  • You can now pass in the existing title to the title prompt.
  • Better documentation of available variables for prompt templating in the README

What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/142
  • chore(deps): update docker/build-push-action action to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/144
  • chore(deps): update docker/setup-buildx-action action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/146
  • chore(deps): update docker/login-action action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/145
  • chore(deps): update docker/setup-qemu-action action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/153
  • Make the existing document title available in prompt template. by @IngmarStein in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/158
  • feat: add correspondent prompt template and update title parameter in… by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/159

New Contributors

  • @IngmarStein made their first contribution in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/158

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.9.1...v0.9.2
